Portfolio Website

This website!!

The program that started it all. Written for the Tesla Property and Title team, this is the code that put me on the path to becoming a developer. Is it DRY? Well written? No. Easy to understand? Succinct? Um, no again. Then why is it listed here?

I taught myself to code to write this program. Frustrated at the tedious parts of a job I otherwise loved, I decided to make it happen. I took to Youtube and Udemy and learned Visual Basic for Applications. I chose VBA because we already made heavy use of Excel on our team, and writing the code in VBA would require special permissions or even require installation to use. I simply bundled it into a workbook (or two) and passed the workbooks out to the team.

Click for more...

Stamp Champ was also written for Tesla, though it was written completely on my own time and is fully owned by me.

Stamp Champ is a full stack app written React, Node, Express, and ProstgreSQL.

Click for more...

Smart Grocery is a full stack web app. It is written in React, Node, Express and MongoDB. It sorts your grocery list by store and aisle. Your entries can contain personal descriptions and your submissions are stored.

You can search for previously purchased items in real time.

Click for more...
